mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, SELLSKU, SHOPID, SHOPNAME, SHOPUSERID, NUMFORUS, NUMFORAU, NUMFORUK, NUMFORCA, NUMFORDE, TOTAL, RESERVE1, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, CORPID, OPER, OPENFLAG, OPERIME, CREATETIME, FLAGUS, FLAGAU, FLAGUK, FLAGCA, FLAGDE, TEMPORARY, RESERVE2 from db_sellskuforshop where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select SEQUENCEID, SELLSKU, SHOPID, SHOPNAME, SHOPUSERID, NUMFORUS, NUMFORAU, NUMFORUK, NUMFORCA, NUMFORDE, TOTAL, RESERVE1, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, CORPID, OPER, OPENFLAG, OPERIME, CREATETIME, FLAGUS, FLAGAU, FLAGUK, FLAGCA, FLAGDE, TEMPORARY, RESERVE2 from db_sellskuforshop
mapper.sql: SEQUENCEID , SELLSKU , SHOPID , SHOPNAME , SHOPUSERID , NUMFORUS , NUMFORAU , NUMFORUK , NUMFORCA , NUMFORDE , TOTAL , RESERVE1 , RESERVE3 , RESERVE4 , RESERVE5 , CORPID , OPER , OPENFLAG , OPERIME , CREATETIME , FLAGUS , FLAGAU , FLAGUK , FLAGCA , FLAGDE , TEMPORARY , RESERVE2

SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
SELLSKU = #{sellsku,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SHOPID = #{shopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SHOPNAME = #{shopname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SHOPUSERID = #{shopuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
NUMFORUS = #{numforus,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
NUMFORAU = #{numforau,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
NUMFORUK = #{numforuk,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
NUMFORCA = #{numforca,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
NUMFORDE = #{numforde,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
TOTAL = #{total,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPERIME = #{operime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
FLAGUS = #{flagus,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
FLAGAU = #{flagau,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
FLAGUK = #{flaguk,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
FLAGCA = #{flagca,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
FLAGDE = #{flagde,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
TEMPORARY = #{temporary,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1
